titles.title: Accumulated Earnings Tax Modification Act of 2005
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude working capital in applying the accumulated earnings tax.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/25/2005--Introduced. Accumulated Earnings Tax Modification Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude working capital from inclusion in the calculation of accumulated earnings tax.
